description: This file defines a Lightning.js component called NoteEditor, responsible for rendering and managing a note editing interface, including title and content editing, auto-saving, and subscribing to notes updates.

classes.name: NoteEditor
classes.description: A Lightning.js component for editing notes, including UI rendering, state management, auto-saving, and subscription to note updates.

methods.name: $updateSaveVisuals
methods.description: Updates the save button visuals based on saving state.

methods.name: $queueAutoSave
methods.description: Queues auto-saving of the current note after a debounce delay.

methods.name: $save
methods.description: Saves the current note with provided explicit flag to trigger save visuals.
